```{r, fig.width=28, fig.height=42}
library(gridExtra)
library(ggplot2)
library(grid)
library(ggpubr)

#Create a grid layout
grid_layout <- rbind(c(1, 2, 3, 4),
                     c(5, 6, 7, 8),
                     c(9, 10, 11, 12),
                     c(13, 14, 15, 16),
                     c(17, 18, 19, 20),
                     c(21, 22, 23, 24))

# Arrange the plots in a grid
grid_1 <- grid.arrange(
  x1, x2, x3, x4,
  x5, x6, x7, x8,
  x9, x10, x11, x12,
  x13, x14, x15, x16,
  x17, x18, x19, x20,
  x21, x22, x23, x24,
  layout_matrix = grid_layout
)

ggsave("~/export/suppl1_300dpi_extra.png", plot = grid_1, dpi = 300)
ggsave("~/export/suppl1_300dpi_extra.pdf", plot = grid_1, dpi = 300)
```
